name: Snowba [DEMO]
description:
It's your first day working at Snowba, the local boba shop. A few regulars begin to show up again after the "Snowed-In" has since subsided. Antics ensue.

*This is currently a demo that showcases the first day of the game. 

Regardless, we hope you enjoy playing!

  • Immersive boba making gameplay
    • Many ingredients to pick from
      • 4 toppings, 2 syrups, milk, and tea 
    • Plenty of possible drink combinations
  • A story of peculiar customers
  • In which those customers will judge you off their vague orders 
    • Varied reactions based on how accurate your drink was (find them all!)
  • A cozy, warm environment
  • Left-Click to advance dialogue
  • Hold Left-Click to pick up ingredients 
    • Drag Mouse to move and place ingredients into cup and shake drinks
  • Hover Mouse over ingredients and receipts to view details

All assets and sounds are made and intended for the game.
